title: Search results not cleared after moving X.java to 'P/src2'
OB: Move X.java to 'P/src2'. Observe that the search result is still displayed in the search view. Attempting to double-click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog with the following message: An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.
EB: After moving X.java to 'P/src2', the search results should be automatically cleared from the search view.
SR: When a Java file is moved to a different location, the search results for that file should be removed from the search view to avoid confusion and prevent errors when attempting to open non-existent files.
